bibl.title: When Papyri and Codices Speak: Revisiting John 2,23-25.
bibl.note: 1. Viewpoints of modern commentators on John 2, 23-25. - 2. Evidence from the earliest manuscripts. - 3. Reflection and proposal: 2, 23-25 as an anticlimactic concluding remark. - Avec résumé en anglais.
bibl.seg: Josaphat C. Tam, When Papyri and Codices Speak: Revisiting John 2,23-25.

1. Viewpoints of modern commentators on John 2, 23-25. - 2. Evidence from the earliest manuscripts. - 3. Reflection and proposal: 2, 23-25 as an anticlimactic concluding remark. - Avec résumé en anglais.
